quotes.message: A man who has never gone to school may steal from a freight car; but if he has a university education, he may steal the whole railroad.
quotes.name: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.message: Does college pay? They do if you are a good open-field runner.
quotes.name: Will Rogers

quotes.message: The primary purpose of a liberal education is to make one's mind a pleasant place in which to spend one's leisure.
quotes.name: Sydney J Harris

quotes.message: I have never let schooling interfere with my education.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: You can lead a boy to college, but you can't make him think.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: Without education we are in a horrible and deadly danger of taking educated people seriously.
quotes.name: G.K Chesterton

quotes.message: Economists report that a college education adds many thousands of dollars to a man's lifetime income--which he then spends sending his son to college.
quotes.name: Bill Vaughan

quotes.message: The things taught in schools and colleges are not an education, but the means to an education.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: College is a refuge from hasty judgment.
quotes.name: Robert Lee Frost

quotes.message: I was thrown out of college for cheating on the metaphysics exam; I looked into the soul of the boy sitting next to me.
quotes.name: Woody Allen

quotes.message: Never get married in college; it's hard to get a start if a prospective employer finds you've already made one mistake.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: Cauliflower is nothing but cabbage with a college education.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: I think everyone should go to college and get a degree and then spend six months as a bartender and six months as a cabdriver. Then they would really be educated.
quotes.name: Al McGuire

quotes.message: I am often amazed at how much more capability and enthusiasm for science there is among elementary school youngsters than among college students.
quotes.name: Carl Sagan

quotes.message: Going to college offered me the chance to play football for four more years.
quotes.name: Ronald Regan
